overview:
We provide a unique and new bespoke tailored property management and maintenance services for UK Landlords and Home Owners to meet their
needs. We are NOT an estate agent we are a genuine alternative to them providing better and cost-effective solution for landlords and Home owners

Also provide property consultancy, Mortgages, Financial advice, Selling, Buying, Renting, Development and refurbishment of property

Provide Holiday rental property holiday rentals in London for visitors coming to the UK (currently). i.e rooms, apartments, houses, house boats, sofa etc. Also provide executive search we find accommodation tailored to your individual requirement.

SmartOwnerSolutions Alvin Onyechi 109 sceptre road, Bethnal Green London London E2 0JU 07956 494 418 0208 980 5488 info@smartownersolutions.co.uk nyechi@hotmail.com http://www.sosgamesrentals.com/
